synopsis.text: Hachi and the elusive Mysterious Joker, the duo behind the daring heists, are back for another thrilling season! The cunning thief, known for his audacious exploits and miraculous escapes, is not just in it for the loot. With his trusty partner and culinary expert Hachi by his side, the pair embarks on a global quest for the legendary Timeslip Treasure. Along the way, they face off in various competitions and narrowly evade police traps, making their journey as exciting as it is perilous. Get ready for a rollercoaster ride of adventures as the Phantom Thief Joker continues to leave his mark on the world!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
